subject: Re: SSU | Gallery files
preview: +45 mins and closed (20 minute phone call +Jaime's updates)All map embeds changed to GMB links where possible.

full_threads.body:
+45 mins and closed (20 minute phone call +Jaime's updates)
All map embeds changed to GMB links where possible.

Hi @chris done updating in locations page

https://sydneyshoulderunit.com.au/locations/

Screenshot


Time: +20mins @ricaR

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,

Some updates for: https://sydneyshoulderunit.com.au/

1. Add 2 new clinic locations to the locations page. Please duplicate the lower 2 and change the BG to grey (shown by arrow).

A)
Macquarie St Clinic
Suite 904, British Medical Association (BMA) House
135 Macquarie St
Sydney NSW 2000

B)
Telehealth Video Appointment
Website: https://doxy.me/drpant
Please click on link above or the image and you will be taken to Dr Pant's waiting room.

The holding image for telehealth is attached, please remove the other doctor and use profile image of Dr Sushil)

￼￼

Another location:


Telehealth Video Appointment
Website: https://doxy.me/drpant
Please click on link above or the image and you will be taken to Dr Pant's waiting room.


add hyperlink to the above
and hyperlink image (which will be location) - click here to join Dr Pant's virtual waiting room

i've added a few images for you to choose from (and example of other surgeons)



SP






__

Dr Sushil PANT
Orthopaedic Shoulder Surgeon | Sydney Shoulder Unit

Suite 211, 203-233 New South Head Road, Edgecliff NSW 2027
P: 02 9215 6100 | F: 02 9215 6190 | M: 0416 204 770

<https://sydneyshoulderunit.com.au/>
